title: Bose Corporation
summary: Bose Corporation (/bo äz/) is an American manufacturing company that predominantly sells audio equipment. The company was established by Amar Bose in 1964 and is based in Framingham, Massachusetts. Bose is best known for its home audio systems and speakers, noise-cancelling headphones, professional audio products and automobile sound systems.[4][5][6] Bose has a reputation for being particularly protective of its patents, trademarks, and brands.
